name: IBM Carbon Icons
description:
This icon library is optimized to work as components. The unified layer names make changing icons while preserving the color as seamless as possible.


As visual symbols, IBM user interface icons represent ideas, objects or actions. They can communicate messages at a glance, afford interactivity, and draw attention to important information. Based on details from the IBM PlexÂ® typeface, they work well at small sizes.


Library and Documentation (best for finding icons): https://www.ibm.com/design/language/iconography/ui-icons/library


This is an unofficial release. I am in no way affiliated with IBM. The icons were published by IBM under the Apache License 2.0.


Update September 16, 2021

  • 89 net new icons
  • 3 updated icons


Update July 20, 2021

  • 144 net new icons
  • 12 updated icons


Update May 26, 2021

  • 33 net new icons
  • 4 updated icons
  • 1 removed icon
